#summary Read data from sqlitedatabase

  #Connect to the phone via ADB (USB or ADB Wireless)
  #In the console on the computer go to the local directory you want to save the database to.
  #write adb pull /[the_dir_to_noxdroid.db_on_your_phone]/noxdroid.db ./[rename or empty to keep noxdroid.db]

Install [https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/sqlite-manager/ Firefox SQLiteManager]

Open Firefox SQLiteManager and connect to the downloaded noxdroid database 

=== Getting NOX from the nox table === 
select time_stamp, nox from nox where time_stamp >= (select time_stamp_start from tracks where _id = 12) and time_stamp  <= (select time_stamp_end from tracks where _id = 12)

=== Getting locations from the locations table ===

select time_stamp,location_provider, latitude, longitude from locations where time_stamp >= (select time_stamp_start from tracks where _id = 12) and time_stamp  <= (select time_stamp_end from tracks where _id = 12) order by time_stamp asc
